skills.name: Webhook Concept
skills.pattern: Push events to URL, reverse API, real-time notifications

skills.name: Webhooks vs Polling
skills.pattern: Webhook: instant, efficient. Polling: delay, waste

skills.name: Webhook Events
skills.pattern: user.created, payment.completed, order.shipped

skills.name: Webhook Payload
skills.pattern: {event, data, timestamp, id}, JSON body

skills.name: Event Envelope
skills.pattern: {type, id, created_at, data: {...}}

skills.name: Idempotency
skills.pattern: Include event ID, receivers track processed IDs

skills.name: Retry Logic
skills.pattern: Exponential backoff, max retries, dead letter

skills.name: Timeout Handling
skills.pattern: 5-30 second timeout, retry on timeout

skills.name: Webhook Signatures
skills.pattern: HMAC-SHA256, shared secret, X-Signature header

skills.name: Verify Signature
skills.pattern: Compute HMAC, compare with header, reject mismatch

skills.name: Timestamp Validation
skills.pattern: Include timestamp, reject old webhooks, 5 min tolerance

skills.name: IP Allowlisting
skills.pattern: Only accept from known IPs, document IP ranges

skills.name: Webhook Endpoint
skills.pattern: POST endpoint, parse body, verify signature, respond 200

skills.name: Quick Response
skills.pattern: Return 200 immediately, process async, avoid timeout

skills.name: Idempotent Processing
skills.pattern: Store processed event IDs, skip duplicates

skills.name: Queue Processing
skills.pattern: Queue webhook, background job processes, reliable

skills.name: Webhook Registration
skills.pattern: API to register URL, select events, test endpoint

skills.name: Webhook Dashboard
skills.pattern: List registered, delivery status, retry, logs

skills.name: Event Filtering
skills.pattern: Choose specific events, reduce noise

skills.name: Delivery Status
skills.pattern: Log attempts, status codes, retry count

skills.name: Failed Webhooks
skills.pattern: Retry queue, exponential backoff, alert on repeated failure

skills.name: Replay Capability
skills.pattern: Manual replay, webhook logs, recovery

skills.name: Testing Webhooks
skills.pattern: ngrok, localtunnel, Stripe CLI, mock events

skills.name: Webhook Testing Tools
skills.pattern: webhook.site, RequestBin, Hookdeck

skills.name: Stripe Webhooks
skills.pattern: stripe.webhooks.constructEvent(), signature verify

skills.name: GitHub Webhooks
skills.pattern: Push, PR, issues, X-Hub-Signature-256

skills.name: Svix
skills.pattern: Webhook service, retries, signatures, dashboard

skills.name: Fan-Out
skills.pattern: One event to multiple endpoints, parallel delivery

skills.name: Webhook Gateway
skills.pattern: Single entry point, routing, transformation

skills.name: Webhook Documentation
skills.pattern: Event catalog, payload schemas, examples, testing
